project3Description: SliceMyPDF is a web application designed to enable users to upload PDF documents and extract specific pages or ranges, creating new PDF files containing only the desired content. Built using Python and the Flask web framework, it offers a straightforward interface developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application is deployed on an Ubuntu server hosted on AWS EC2, ensuring scalability and reliability.â€‹
